title: Tantra Works
description:
This is a collection of materials for serious Tantra students. There
are here for reference only and if you choose to use those -- please
buy the original or donate money to help creators of those materials
continue doing an amazing job.

If you want to learn more about Tantra and take courses with Swami
Vivekananda Saraswati go to http://agamayoga.com/.  (note that this
DVD's production was not associated with the agama yoga school). I
just highly recommend this Tantra Yoga School.

All the materials in this DVD can be found elsewhere on the net. I
just compiled those together to save you time.

It contains 

* lectures by Swami Vivekananda Saraswati
* music that activates chakras
* some e-books recommended by Swami

Note: I had to rar parts of it, due to the limitation of this
tracker. When you unrar all the parts it should fit into a 4.7GB DVD.
